name: Churbles - Adorably Tough RPG - Wii U, PS4, XBO, PC, Mac
blurb: An adventure RPG featuring cute, but tough heroes, local co-op, and highly customizable skills, abilities, and play styles

rewards.reward: No Reward

"Founder" - ========================== Thank you! Believe it or not this pledge makes a huge difference. Not because it is a mighty dollar, but because of YOU. You are telling the world that, "YES I am interested in this project!" And that goes a long way towards getting the game onto consoles and other platforms.
\u201cChurble\u201d - The Game\r\n==========================\r\nOne DRM-Free digital copy of the Game.

"Raydurs" ========================== Who wants to play as the good guys anyways? With this pledge you begin the game with access to the 3 main Raydur skins: Warlord, Bandit, and Warlock! ========================== \r\nAlso includes everything from the QUARTERMASTER, HERO & Scout Tiers

"Royal Guard" ========================== Can\u2019t wait for the launch? Want to help shape the world first hand? Pledge as a Royal Guard to unlock access to our closed Beta testing and get access to the Beta Forums. Play the game, give us your feedback, help us make the game the best it can possibly be. ========================== Also includes everything from the Raydurs, QUARTERMASTER, HERO & Scout Tiers! You will also be listed in the credits as \u201cRoyal Guards, protectors of the World\u2019s Development.\u201d

"Legendary Weapon Smith" - Churbow  ========================== There are EIGHT! legendary weapons hidden throughout the realms of Churble World. At this tier you become one of the 7 legendary Smiths of Ancient times. Working with our artists and developers you will design the Legendary Churbow, name it, and help craft the lore for it. You will also be listed in the games credits as a Legendary Smith. You'll receive a signed print of the concept art from your design. ========================== Also includes everything from the Royal Guard, Raydurs, QUARTERMASTER, HERO & Scout Tiers!

At this tier you become one of the 7 legendary Smiths of Ancient times. Working with our artists and developers you will design the Legendary Relic, name it, and help craft the lore for it. You will also be listed in the games credits as a Legendary Smith. You'll receive a signed print of the concept art from your design.  \r\n==========================\r\nAlso includes everything from the Royal Guard, Raydurs, QUARTERMASTER, HERO & Scout Tiers!

"Legendary Weapon Smith" - Staff ========================== There are 7 legendary weapons hidden throughout the realms of Churble World. At this tier you become one of the 7 legendary Smiths of Ancient times. Working with our artists and developers you will design the Legendary Staff, name it, and help craft the lore for it. You will also be listed in the games credits as a Legendary Smith. You'll receive a signed print of the concept art from your design.  \r\n==========================\r\nAlso includes everything from the Royal Guard, Raydurs, QUARTERMASTER, HERO & Scout Tiers!

"You NPC, you..." ========================== \r\nFarmer Chobbson's crops have gone missing, he needs a hero! But wait what if YOU were that Farmer? Or the sneaky Bandit Prince, or the doting lackey? At this tier we take your likeness, and Churblize it, turning you (or a loved one) into a Churble NPC who will be featured in the story line of the game. In addition to being immortalized as an NPC in the game you will also receive a signed print of the concept art. ========================== Also includes everything from the Royal Guard, Raydurs, QUARTERMASTER, HERO & Scout Tiers! Plus an extra copy of the game to give to a friend. You will be listed in the credits as an Epic NPC.

"A Tailor of Legends" ========================== \r\nDesign a premium skin for the Churbles! Are you envisioning your Churble decked out in the coolest costume imaginable? Well let\u2019s make it happen. With this pledge you will work with our Artists to create an original premium skin for the game! (Must meet an E for everyone rating). You'll receive a signed print of the concept art from your design. ========================== Also includes everything from the Royal Guard, Raydurs, QUARTERMASTER, HERO & Scout Tiers! You will be listed in the credits as a Tailor of Legend.

"You Are Legend" ========================== Your founder is not the first Churble to pick up sword and spell to follow the path of heroism. There are living legends wandering Churble World dispatching deadly beasts and dispersing skills and knowledge of their trade. You are such a Legend. Work with our artists to design a legendary hero who can be discovered and recruited during the course of the game. Design a custom skin and weapon set for your Legend, work with our writers to come up with a cool back story and history (must meet an E for everyone rating). While this hero has retired from adventuring and is not playable, they will live in the Guild Hall imparting knowledge and skills to the next generation. You also receive a signed print of the concept art of your Legend. ========================== Also includes everything from the Royal Guard, Raydurs, QUARTERMASTER, HERO & Scout Tiers!

"Mid-Boss" 
============================  
Like any good JRPG Churble World has powerful, hero crushing super monsters hidden away in the dark corners waiting to destroy any hero foolish enough to find them. As a Mid-Boss it will be your destiny to design such a beast! Work with our artists and developers to redesign and re texture an existing monster from the game. Make it crazy tough. Make it soul stomping strong. Help us design a unique secret boss fight involving this monster that Churbles will have nightmares about. Should the Churbles be victorious they will receive a unique weapon skin or Hat Item to commemorate the occasion. You will design that too! You'll receive a signed print of the concept art from your designs. ==========================
Also includes everything from the Royal Guard, Raydurs, QUARTERMASTER, HERO & Scout Tiers! As well as 2 extra copies of the game and an item that allows YOU to fight this beast anytime you want! You will also be listed in the credits as a designer and by the name of your Mid-Boss.

"Master of Monsters" ==========================\r\nWork with our artists and developers to create a new species of monster! Name it, help develop the lore for it. When the base mesh is finished, work with our game designer to create a powerful boss fight featuring a boss version of your monster! ========================== But wait, there's more! We will design a baby version of your monster to be used as a Guild Hall pet. You get one and so do 19 of your friends! Your monster must meet an E for everyone rating and fit with the existing lore of the Churble World. You'll receive a signed print of the concept art from your designs and be credited as The Master (or Mistress) of Monsters. ==========================\r\nAlso includes everything from the Royal Guard, Raydurs, QUARTERMASTER, HERO & Scout Tiers!

"Dungeon Master" - ========================== 
Do you have an epic tale of legendary heroism to tell? Do you want to tell that tale with Churbles? As the Dungeon Master you will work with our entire team to write, design, and develop a side quest line for the Churbles game! This side quest can contain up to 6 story scenes and 6 scripted fights (3 of which can be boss battles). We will create up to 3 texture variations to existing models. We will also Churblize 3 people of your choice to include as NPCs. The storyline must meet an E for everyone rating and fit with the existing lore of the Churble World. 
==========================
We'll also give you 19 copies of the game to give to anyone you want! Show them your masterpiece! You will also be listed as a designer and as "Dungeon Master" in the credits of the game. Includes everything from the Royal Guard, Raydurs, QUARTERMASTER, HERO & Scout Tiers!
